name: sanft-backend
description: Bundler for Utools plugin preload scripts

scripts.build: esbuild src/preload.js src/window_preload.js src/fast_window_preload.js src/runtime/file_runtime.js src/runtime/mcp_runtime.js src/runtime/skill_runtime.js --bundle --minify --platform=node --outdir=./public --outbase=src --format=cjs --external:electron --legal-comments=none
scripts.watch: esbuild src/preload.js src/window_preload.js src/fast_window_preload.js src/runtime/file_runtime.js src/runtime/mcp_runtime.js src/runtime/skill_runtime.js --bundle --platform=node --outdir=./public --outbase=src --format=cjs --external:electron --watch
